title: AddressTransaction
description: Address transaction with STX, FT and NFT transfer summaries

stx_sent.description: Total sent from the given address, including the tx fee, in micro-STX as an integer string.

stx_received.description: Total received by the given address in micro-STX as an integer string.

stx_transfers.description: Number of STX transfers for this account in this transaction

ft_transfers.description: Number of FT transfers for this account in this transaction

nft_transfers.description: Number of NFT transfers for this account in this transaction
